sentences.sContent: The method I developed requires no eyepiece and no control of the RA axis movement.
sentences.sContent_eng: The method I developed requires no eyepiece and no control of the RA axis movement.
sentences.sCn: 小弟开发的方法， 不需要接目镜， 也不用可以控制赤经轴的移动。

sentences.sContent: A person downloads software to a phone and attaches a plastic eyepiece over the screen.
sentences.sContent_eng: A person downloads software to a phone and attaches a plastic eyepiece over the screen.
sentences.sCn: 一个人将软件下载到手机上，并在屏幕上方附上塑料目镜。

sentences.sContent: The user looks into the eyepiece and uses the buttons on the phone to move two lines until they appear as one.
sentences.sContent_eng: The user looks into the eyepiece and uses the buttons on the phone to move two lines until they appear as one.
sentences.sCn: 使用者通过目镜观察，并使用手机上的按键移动屏幕上的两条直线，直到它们重叠到一起。

trans.tranOther: the glass piece that you look through in a microscope or telescope
